snippet: Barclays faces accusations that it manipulated California energy markets. | JPMorgan Chase is going after the boss of the traders known as the London Whale. | The major American exchanges had a largely uneventful day of trading on Wednesday after...
abstract: Barclays faces accusations that it manipulated California energy markets. | JPMorgan Chase is going after the boss of the traders known as the London Whale. | The major American exchanges had a largely uneventful day of trading on Wednesday after being shut down for two days because of Hurricane Sandy.
